name: Cyber Samurai: Ninja Warrior
description:
Cyber Samurai: Ninja Warrior

In the year 2105 humans are augmented with cybernetic improvements to traits such as vision, strength, and intelligence. Traditional Samurai,Ronin and ninja warriors are turned into more sophisticated forms with the help of computer technologies. Terrorists are also using computer technology for their criminal activities. They are not only targeting earth but also the galaxy. Elise's,the daughter of Arashi,starship is captured by an army of ninjas of the Dark Grifter. Dark Grifter is an undefeatable shadow ninja fighter and terrorist. He is trying to rule all of the galaxy with his army of ninja warriors.


Story Line
Elise the daughter of general arashi was captured by the Dark Grifter but she sent all information to his best fighter Shogun Cyber Samurai and asked him to save them from Dark Grifter. The holographic recording of Elise helps Cyber Samurai on his journey to beat the Dark Grifter army of ninja.
Cyber Samurai discovers that Elise is imprisoned on the spaceship and he is ready to rescue her.


Cybernetic Adventure of The Last Samurai
Else Daughter of Arshi always trust on his best cyber samurai assassin and she knows that The shadow ninja assassin will fights and beats all the Dark Grifter army and free her

Army of c Dark Grifter (Boss Battles)
Dark Grifter is not alone he has more allies Cyber Orc,Cyber Girl and many more. These dark forces will try to stop cyber samurai but cyber samurai shadow ninja will kill each one and destroy the enemies world as Arashi thought.


It’s the last showdown of samurai shadow ninja warrior but it will not be so easy. The best cyber 3D experience ninja games and adventure of a legend ninja assassin and samurai with a cybernetic sword fighting Japanese style. This is the best action rpg adventure games among samurai games
These are legends of samurai
